resources.string:
Global Warming is a challenge that will haunt us probably until this century is over.
Centuries is also the time politics takes to make notable changes.
That is why the first step towards change starts with us.
Taking that step requires a simple and fast assessment of your carbon footprint.
So go ahead and trace your carbons!

Carbon Tracer consists of four elements: the chat, camera, Tracer, and a statistics page.

 1. Chat: Talk to the Tracer AI via text or voice messages.
 2. Camera: Photograph objects you want add tot the tracer.
 3. Tracer: A list of all Traceables.
 4. Statistics: Distribution of your carbon footprint and top emitters.

Adding new Traceables to the Tracer can be done in 2 ways:
 1. Take a photo: You can take a photo of an item in the Camera Tab. The AI will detect it, and you can add info to assess the CO2 emissions.
 2. Manually add: You can manually add the traceable by pressing the plus sign at the top of the Tracer.
To remove the traceables, select them and press the trash bin icon.
The Tracer is the heart of this app.\nIt is a list of all the objects, activities, etc. that the user added to assess their CO2 emissions.\nThey are referred to as Traceables.
